overview:
Kevin Bachus is Chief Product Officer at Bebo. Prior to that, he was CEO at Nival Interactive.

Earning a degree in Cinema-Television Production from the University of Southern California, Mr. Bachus had his start in the gaming industry with Mindscape as the Director of Product Development from May 1993 till June 1997. Mr. Bachus left Mindscape to join Microsoft, originally working as the product manager for the DirectX project.

Mr. Bachus is known as one of the four men who comprised the original design team that engineered the XBOX gaming console, and he eventually became the Director of Third Party relations for the XBOX He left Microsoft in 2001 with Seamus Blackley to form the Capital Entertainment Group. Mr. Bachus then moved on to join Infinium Labs, where we became the CEO and President.
